page.title: 01General Description & Author
page.content: This survey was made by class 3/4C of {Malmesbury Primary School}and groups of pupils from{Malmesbury {Comprehensive Lower School. { {The River{Avon}flows through this agricultural area. Mainly beef or dairy farming is carried out on the 9 farms.Few crops are grown,most of the ground cover is grassland.This is {Beaufort Hunt country}and includes some old Cotswold stone properties in the villages of{Rodbourne and {Corston.Cole Park}is a fine country house near{Malmesbury. Corston is on the main Malmesbury to Chippenham road but Rodbourne has no bus service.The disused Malmesbury to Dauntsey Railway line crosses our area.{The Little Somerford viaduct carries the busy Swindon/South Wales line near{Kingsmead Mill.}
